featured.text: This clip is therefore sometimes 36 the Gem clip.
The 35 looped design was invented by Gem Manufacturing Ltd. in England.

definition.zh_def: 寶石，通常是經過切割和拋光的貴重礦物或有機物，常用於珠寶製作。
definition.en_def: A precious or semi-precious stone, especially when cut and polished, used in jewelry.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful necklace adorned with a sparkling gem.
